data.eml:eml: Key to the species of Eotrechinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Thailand and review of the fauna of the Phetchabun Mountain Range

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nakthong, La-Au, Vitheepradit, Akekawat, Sites, Robert W. (2014): Key to the species of Eotrechinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) of Thailand and review of the fauna of the Phetchabun Mountain Range. Zootaxa 3860 (1): 47-63, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3860.1.2
